comment: Great powerpoint handouts provide summaries of everything you need to know including step by step for software programs such as SPSS. Proof read your stat papers, he will deduct for sloppy grammar.

kinda boring but very nice guy... knowledgable... reads straight from power points (which is all u need to study)... decently easy multiple choice tests...curves grades and will let you argue answers (take it from the pro;-))...looking for an easy class? take this one... BUT u still learn a decent amount too... just no BS work

Class is easy - until SPSS. Brush up on stats before you use it. Someone in your group should know stats. He's a decent prof - getting old, but was nice and answered questions.  Took this course in four days. Lots of info real fast. Don't be fooled by easiness of first part of the class.

Class material is easy, up until last few weeks of semester.  SPSS data analysis is a really not fun, but can be done... get a good group!  super nice teacher, projects are turned in as PPT presentations and not essays.

Very knowledgable. Course starts our ultra easy w/focus on surveys.  The last part of the course is richer w/ focus on analysis.  Easiest class in the MBA program.  Hair is also an expert in data mining.
